line_1: The brackish Tast and pungent Salts displease.
line_2: Near Rivers stay, and shun the distant Seas;

line_1: So They, while no approaching Shores displease,
line_2: Swim with the Ship tumultuous o'er the Seas.

line_1: Can move our spleen, that real faults displease.
line_2: No wonder then, since fancies wild as these

line_1: If any hapless Wretch the King displease,
line_2: His Neighbours ne'er dispute, but on him seize;
To nicest Judgment show the Piece;

line_1: The wine was not bad, tho' the ale did displease,
line_2: And an unctuous desert was serv'd up of old cheese;

line_1: If haply I his will displease,
Nor could he dare prefumptuously displease
line_2: A pow'r confess'd so lately on his knees.
